projects.name: NITC Buy Sell
projects.description: This project was about to create a web application for the NITC students that can be helpful for them to buy or sell any second hand products as per their choice.

projects.name: BoldBazaar
projects.description: Developed a full-fledged dynamic web-application which includes all the necessary functionalities of an e-commerce webapplication.

projects.name: NITC Student Guidance Cell
projects.description: As part of a team project, we developed an education-focused platform that streamlined user authentication, managed profiles, and facilitated appointment bookings.

projects.name: Covid-19 Face Mask Detector
projects.description: Developed a COVID-19 Face Mask Detector using Jupyter, CNN with VGG16 architecture, and Haar Cascade XML to detect faces and fill them with rectangles.

projects.name: FreeTalks
projects.description: Developed a responsive blog application using PHP Laravel and MySQL. Designed and implemented the application's architecture, database schema, and user interface.

projects.name: iNoteBook
projects.description: Developed a MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) stack web application with user authentication and password encryption. Users can seamlessly manage their daily notes.
